/* SA011005.selectListIpgumDtl */ SELECT A.IPGUMID , A.SEQ , A.SALEID , A.IPGUMSEQ , A.SUGUMAMT , A.REMARK AS DTL_REMARK , B.IPGUMDATE , B.IPGUMTYPE , fn_codename('01', '012', B.IPGUMTYPE) AS NAME_IPGUMTYPE , B.IPGUMGUBUN , fn_codename('01', '009', B.IPGUMGUBUN) AS NAME_IPGUMGUBUN , B.BANKGUBUN , fn_codename('01', '015', B.BANKGUBUN) AS NAME_BANKGUBUN , B.IPGUMAMT , B.REMARK AS MST_REMARK , B.IPGUMPERSON , C.DEPOSITDATE , C.DEPOSITYN FROM sa_ipgumdtl A INNER JOIN sa_ipgummst B ON A.IPGUMID = B.IPGUMID INNER JOIN sa_ipgumscheduletb C ON A.SALEID = C.SALEID AND A.IPGUMSEQ = C.IPGUMSEQ WHERE A.SALEID = #SALEID# AND A.IPGUMSEQ = #IPGUMSEQ# ORDER BY A.IPGUMID ASC, A.SEQ ASC

/* SA011005.selectListIpgumMst */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.IPGUMID , A.IPGUMDATE , A.IPGUMTYPE , fn_codename('01', '012', A.IPGUMTYPE) AS NAME_IPGUMTYPE , A.IPGUMGUBUN , fn_codename('01', '009', A.IPGUMGUBUN) AS NAME_IPGUMGUBUN , A.BANKGUBUN , fn_codename('01', '015', A.BANKGUBUN) AS NAME_BANKGUBUN , A.IPGUMAMT , A.REMARK , A.IPGUMPERSON , A.BRANCHCODE , A.SALERCD , B.KNAME , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl WHERE IPGUMID = A.IPGUMID) AS SUM_SUGUMAMT , (A.IPGUMAMT - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl WHERE IPGUMID = A.IPGUMID)) AS REM_IPGUMAMT FROM sa_ipgummst A LEFT OUTER JOIN hr_insamst B ON A.SALERCD = B.INSACODE WHERE A.IPGUMGUBUN <> '005' AND A.R_IPGUMID IS NULL

AND A.BANKGUBUN = #S_BANKGUBUN#
AND A.IPGUMAMT = #S_IPGUMAMT#
AND B.KNAME LIKE '%$S_KNAME$%'
) T WHERE REM_IPGUMAMT > 0 ORDER BY IPGUMDATE DESC, IPGUMID DESC
